name: 吸血鬼与下午茶 Vampires and Afternoon Tea
name_original: 吸血鬼与下午茶 Vampires and Afternoon Tea
description:
Love oriented visual novel, female lead name cannot be changed, no achievement system.
The text volume is about 60000 words, and there are two characters that can be explored, with over ten endings
Synopsis:
The girl Cecily, who got lost in the forest, was taken in by the mysterious man Kyle. Please try to discover the secrets of this house within 12 days, or you may meet a tragic end.
Characters：



This work was previously released for free online
Compared to the free version, the Steam version has added future discussions. You can search and download the free version before considering whether to purchase this game
Please do not record extra
